languages.text: "Я... все понимаю. И потому спрошу прямо — в последний раз. Вы примете меня, зная, что отношения сгорят дотла, едва успев начаться?"

traits.locale_text: "Я... все понимаю. И потому спрошу прямо — в последний раз. Вы примите меня, зная, что отношения сгорят до тла, едва успев начаться?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"
languages.original_text: "Я... все понимаю. И потому спрошу прямо — в последний раз. Вы примете меня, зная, что отношения сгорят дотла, едва успев начаться?"

traits.locale_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that this relationship will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that this relationship will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

traits.locale_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我……我很理解你的感受。所以，这是我最后一次如此直接地向你确认——如果明知这段感情如同花开花落，不能长久，你还愿意接受它吗？”
languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

traits.locale_text: “我……我很理解你的感受。所以，这是我最后一次如此直接地向你确认——如果明知这段感情如同花开花落，不能长久，你还愿意接受它吗？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... verstehe, wie Ihr Euch fühlt. Daher frage ich Euch direkt und zum letzten Mal: Nehmt Ihr mich an? Auch in dem Wissen, dass unsere Beziehung nur wenige Augenblicke nach ihrem Erblühen zu Asche zerfallen wird?"
languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... verstehe, wie Ihr Euch fühlt. Daher frage ich Euch direkt und zum letzten Mal: Nehmt Ihr mich an? Auch in dem Wissen, dass diese Beziehung nur wenige Augenblicke nach ihrem Erblühen zu Asche zerfallen wird?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je... comprends ce que vous ressentez. Voilà pourquoi je vous le demande, directement et pour la dernière fois : m'acceptez-vous, en sachant que ce que nous avons sera réduit en cendres quelques instants après s'être épanoui ? »
languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

traits.locale_text: « Je... comprends ce que vous ressentez. Voilà pourquoi je vous le demande, directement et pour la dernière fois : m'acceptez-vous, en sachant que cette relation sera réduite en cendres quelques instants après s'être épanouie ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo... entiendo cómo se siente. Por eso le pregunto esto directamente y por última vez: ¿Me aceptará sabiendo que lo que tenemos se convertirá en cenizas momentos después de florecer?».
languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

traits.locale_text: «Yo... entiendo cómo se siente. Por eso le pregunto esto directamente y por última vez: ¿Me aceptará sabiendo que lo que tenemos se convertirá en cenizas momentos después de florecer?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしは…あなたがどう感じるか、理解しています。だからあたくしは直接、そして最後のものとしてこう尋ねるのです。花開いた直後に灰となるかもしれないと知っていて、あなたはあたくしを受け入れるのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは…あなたがどう感じるか、理解しています。だからあたくしは直接、そして最後のものとしてこう尋ねるのです。花開いた直後に灰となるかもしれないと知っていて、あなたはあたくしを受け入れるのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"

languages.text: "Nasıl... Hissettiğini biliyorum. Bu yüzden de şunu açık bir şekilde, son defa soruyorum: Aşk çiçeğimizin açar açmaz küle döneceğini bildiğin hâlde beni kabul edecek misin?"
languages.original_text: "I... understand how you feel. Which is why I ask you this, directly and for the last time: will you accept me, knowing that what we have will turn to ash mere moments after blossoming?"
